short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates strengths and weaknesses for Pokémon types

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are a total of 18 different types in Pokémon, and each Pokémon's type affects each other's attacks and defenses. The first time several people, including me, encounter content related to Pokémon, this can be a barrier to entry. I made this extension because I felt uncomfortable playing while looking at a separate table. I hope this Chrome extension gives many people comfort in playing.

닌텐도 아이콘 제작자: xnimrodx - Flaticon
